describe: Nepal is a landlocked country in South Asia, located mainly in the Himalayas. It is known for its stunning landscapes, rich cultural heritage, and as the home of Mount Everest, the highest peak in the world.

cities.name: üïå Kathmandu
cities.geographical_location: Located in the Kathmandu Valley in central Nepal.
cities.climate: Kathmandu has a temperate climate with warm summers and mild winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Momo (dumplings), Dal Bhat (lentil soup with rice), Newari cuisine.

cities.name: üèî Pokhara
cities.geographical_location: Situated in the western part of Nepal, near the Annapurna mountain range.
cities.climate: Pokhara has a humid subtropical climate with heavy monsoon rains.
cities.famous_cuisine: Thakali set, Fish curry from Phewa Lake.

cities.name: üïå Lumbini
cities.geographical_location: Located in the Rupandehi District of Province No. 5, near the Indian border.
cities.climate: Lumbini has a subtropical climate with hot summers and mild winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Lentil soup, rice, and vegetable curries.
